text: Edmund Walter Fitton-Brown (born 5 October 1962) is a British diplomat. Fitton-Brown is currently a Monitoring Team Coordinator with the United Nations. From February 2015 – February 2017 he served as British Ambassador to Yemen. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Members of HM Diplomatic Service Category:Ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Yemen
title: Edmund Fitton-Brown
